supportPhones.description: List of support phone numbers for the service channel.

supportEmails.description: List of support email addresses for the service channel.
List of support email addresses for the service channel.

organizationId.description: Organization identifier responsible for the channel.

names.description: Localized list of service channel names.

descriptions.description: List of localized service channel descriptions.

formIdentifier.description: List of localized form identifier. One per language.

formReceiver.description: List of localized form receiver. One per language.

supportPhones.description: List of support phone numbers for the service channel.

supportEmails.description: List of support email addresses for the service channel.

languages.description: List of languages the service channel is available in (two letter language code).

webPages.description: List of service channel web pages.

serviceHours.description: List of service channel service hours.

publishingStatus.description: Service channel publishing status. Values: Draft, Published, Deleted, Modified or OldPublished.

organizationId.description: Organization identifier responsible for the channel.

names.description: Localized list of service channel names.

descriptions.description: List of localized service channel descriptions.

serviceAreaRestricted.description: Is the service location channel restricted by service area.

phoneNumbers.description: List of phone numbers for the service channel. Includes also fax numbers.

emails.description: List email addresses for the service channel.

languages.description: List of languages the service channel is available in (two letter language code).

phoneServiceCharge.description: Is the phone service charged for.

webPages.description: List of service channel web pages.

serviceAreas.description: List of serviceareas. Used when location service channel is restricted by service area (ServiceAreaRestricted=true).

serviceHours.description: List of service channel service hours.

publishingStatus.description: Service channel publishing status. Values: Draft, Published, Deleted, Modified or OldPublished.

supportPhones.description: List of support phone numbers for the service channel.

supportEmails.description: List of support email addresses for the service channel.

coordinateState.description:
State of coordinates. Coordinates are fetched from a service provided by Maanmittauslaitos (WFS).
Possible values are: Loading, Ok, Failed, NotReceived, EmptyInputReceived, MultipleResultsReceived or WrongFormatReceived.

postOffice.description: List of localized Post offices, for example Helsinki, Helsingfors.

country.description: Country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2), for example FI.

additionalInformations.description: Localized list of additional information about the address.

validFrom.description: Date time where from this entry is valid.

validTo.description: Date time to this entry is valid.

isClosed.description: Set to true to present a time between the valid from and to times as closed.

validForNow.description: Set to true to present that this entry is valid for now.

openingHour.description: List of servicing hours (open and closes times).

isExtra.description: Set to true to have extra time for a day. Enables to have open times like 10:00-14:00 and also on the same day 16:00-20:00. So the latter time is extra time.
